DMG Data Science Short Course 2023

Last Update: 23.05.2023

Preliminary Program

Online-Part

Mo, 24. July 2023, 08:30 – 10:30 1. online meeting
Mo, 24. July 2023, 08:30 – 10:30 2. online meeting
Mo, 24. July 2023, 08:30 – 10:30 3. online meeting

Presence-Part

Mi, 02. August

08:30 – 10:30 Venue open
08:530 – 09:00 Welcome
09:00 – 10:30 Programming Exercises
10:30 – 10:45 Coffee-Break
10:45 – 11:30 Kirsten Elger: IGSN, Digitale Identität: Orcid, Researchgate & Co. – was ist das, brauche ich das – und wenn ja: was?
11:30 – 11:45 Coffee-Break
11:45 – 13:00 Programming Exercises
13:00 – 14:00 lunch break
14:00 – 14:30 Thomas Rose: Richtig publizieren: Paper, Daten only, Software, GitHub, Open Source – und der ganze Rest
14:30 – 16:00 Programming Exercises
16:00 – 16:15 Coffee-Break
16:15 – 17:00 Rechtsabteilung: Urheberrechte, Nutzungsrechte & Lizenzen: alles nur geklaut, oder was darf ich eigentlich?
17:00 – 18:00 Programming Exercises
18:00 Closing

Do, 03. August

09:00 – 10:30 Programming Exercises
10:30 – 10:45 Coffee-Break
10:45 – 11:30 Alex Prent: MetaData, Vocabularies, AusGeochem & OneGeochemistry
11:30 – 11:45 Coffee-Break
11:45 – 13:00 Programming Exercises
13:00 – 14:00 lunch break
14:00 – 14:30 Thibault Duretz: 1D Diffusion, 2 hours with 15 min break, send 1-2 papers to Thibault, e.g., from Dohmen or Sumit
14:30 – 16:00 Programming Exercises
16:00 – 16:15 Coffee-Break
16:15 – 17:00 Kerstin Lehnert: EarthChem
17:00 – 18:00 Programming Exercises
18:00 Uhr Ende

19:00 Social Evening – likely at Lahmer Esel

Fr, 04. August

09:00 – 10:30 Streamlit
10:30 – 10:45 Coffee-Break
GlobaID 30 min
10:45 – 11:30 Marthe Klöcking: Datenbanken, Repositorien & Co. – gibt es da Unterschiede, oder ist das alles dasselbe?, GEOROC
11:30 – 11:45 Coffee-Break
11:45 – 13:00 Quarto
13:00 – 14:00 lunch break
14:00 – 14:30 Dominik Hezel: NFDI4Earth
14:30 – 16:00 Programming Exercises

Closing?

16:00 – 16:15 Kaffee-Pause
16:15 – 17:00 Kerstin Lehnert: EarthChem oder was darf ich eigentlich?
17:00 – 18:00 Programming Exercises
18:00 Uhr Ende

Miguel Bernecker (GU Frankfurt), json, parser, binäre Dateien – halber Nachmittag Thomas Rose: GlobalID? Uzun ELN

General Information
